hobbies.title: Raúl Mera Soto - Hobbies
hobbies.metaDescription: Hobbies and interests of Raúl Mera Soto, including cinema, video games, music and activities.
hobbies.heading: Hobbies
hobbies.musicDescription: Soundtrack from the video game Celeste
hobbies.videoDescription: A precipitation reaction I performed in high school. In it, potassium iodide and lead nitrate react to form potassium nitrate and lead iodide, the latter giving the resulting compound its characteristic color.

projects.title: Raúl Mera Soto - Projects
projects.metaDescription: Software development projects created by Raúl Mera Soto during his degree.
projects.heading: My Projects
projects.description: Here you can find information about some of the projects I completed during my Degree.
projects.project1Description: A mobile application to efficiently manage your pantry and shopping list.
projects.project2Description: A template to quickly and easily create projects with electron-forge and Vue.js.
projects.project3Description: Project developed in the Architecture course of the degree. A questions and answers application.
projects.project4Description: A project for the Systems and Networks Administration course of the degree using Terraform.
projects.project5Description: Cross-platform desktop application for taking notes and organizing thoughts. Developed as a Final Degree Project with Electron, Vue 3 and TypeScript.
